snippet: A prominent emergency room doctor at Mount Sinai Hospital on the Upper East Side was arrested and accused of drugging, groping and masturbating on a female patient and groping another.
abstract: Emergency room doctor David H Newman is arrested on charges of drugging, groping and masturbating on female patient and groping another patient in separate episodes; Newman, who works at Mount Sinai on Upper East Side of Manhattan, is outspoken proponent of reforms in emergency care.
lead_paragraph: A prominent emergency room doctor at Mount Sinai Hospital on the Upper East Side was arrested and accused of drugging, groping and masturbating on a female patient and groping another.

headline.main: E.R. Doctor at Mt. Sinai Hospital Charged With Sexual Abuse of 2 Patients
headline.print_headline: Prominent E.R. Doctor at Mt. Sinai Is Charged With Sexually Abusing 2 Patients
